definitions.definition: ( Christianity , historical ) A supporter of the Cyrenaic monk Arius and his faction in the 4th- century Church .
( Christianity ) A believer of Arianism , particularly ( historical ) the official Arian churches lasting to the 7th century .
( Christianity , inexact , usually derogatory ) Synonym of unitarian , any Christian who denies the Trinity .
( Christianity , inexact , derogatory , dated ) Synonym of heretic , any Christian differing from any of the beliefs of the speaker .

main_definition: ( Christianity , historical ) A supporter of the Cyrenaic monk Arius and his faction in the 4th- century Church .
secondary_definitions: ( Christianity ) A believer of Arianism , particularly ( historical ) the official Arian churches lasting to the 7th century .
( Christianity , inexact , usually derogatory ) Synonym of unitarian , any Christian who denies the Trinity .
( Christianity , inexact , derogatory , dated ) Synonym of heretic , any Christian differing from any of the beliefs of the speaker .

definitions.definition: ( astrology ) Synonym of Aries , a person born under the influence of Aries .

main_definition: ( astrology ) Synonym of Aries , a person born under the influence of Aries .
